label: dog
caption: A lazy brown dog, sporting a Superman t-shirt, has claimed a soft blue blanket as its own personal sunbeam. It's sprawled out on the blanket, soaking up the warmth of the afternoon sun, completely carefree and content in its tranquil surroundings. The blanket seems to be stretched out just so to cradle the dog's relaxed form, creating a cozy little sanctuary amidst the bustling world outside.
